        public void update(PlayerUnit playerUnit)
        Description copied from interface: Updater
        General update function which gets called when the implementing classes should update their corresponding values / references.
        Specified by:
        update in interface Updater

        update in class ActionUpdaterWorker
        Parameters:
        playerUnit - the PlayerUnit whose properties may change.

      • getClosestFollowableUnit

        private bwapi.Unit getClosestFollowableUnit()
        Function for finding the closest Unit whose UnitType matches one of the listed ones in the PlayerUnitTerran_SCV's List of repairable UnitTypes. Only these types of Units are the ones that a worker may follow.
        Returns:
        the closest Unit that the executing Unit can follow.

      • sortByDistance

        private java.util.List<bwapi.Unit> sortByDistance(java.util.List<bwapi.Unit> list,
                                                  bwapi.Unit executingUnit)
        Function for sorting a List containing Units references based on their distance towards another provided one in an ascending order based on their distance towards it.
        Parameters:
        list - the List of Units that is going to be sorted.
        executingUnit - the reference Unit to which the Units in the sorting List are calculating their distance to.
        Returns:
        the sorted List of Units (Ascending) based on the distance of the Units to the provided one.

      • getRepairActionTargetUnit

        private bwapi.Unit getRepairActionTargetUnit()
        Function for finding a target to repair (Unit) that is not already mapped to another worker Unit in the executing Unit's confidence range.
        Note:
        The Unit has to either be unmapped or mapped to the executing Unit itself!
        Returns:
        a Unit that the worker Unit can repair.

      • getRepairActionTargetBuilding

        private bwapi.Unit getRepairActionTargetBuilding()
        Function for finding a target to repair (Building) that is not already mapped to another worker Unit in the executing Unit's confidence range.
        Note:
        The Unit has to either be unmapped or mapped to the executing Unit itself!
        Returns:
        a building that the worker Unit can repair.

      • getDamagedUnitsInConfidenceRange

        private java.util.List<bwapi.Unit> getDamagedUnitsInConfidenceRange()
        Function for extracting all damaged Player Units from the Collection of Units in the executing Unit's confidence range.
        Returns:
        a List of damaged Player Units in the executing Unit's confidence range.

      • init

        protected void init()
        Description copied from class: ActionUpdaterGeneral
        Function used for retrieving the references to the different actions. This function should be overwritten by subclasses to provide further functionalities.
        Overrides:
        init in class ActionUpdaterWorker
